title: RIOT PLEASE GIVE ME 3 RP
body:
I'm going to get a $25 RP card and i did the math, im going to be 3 rp under being able to get battlecast vel'koz.
can u please give me this rp

replies.body:
send in a support ticket with a drawing/poem and explain your situation. Im sure they will help you out!

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

WAIT, a poem? thats a first.
Can I literally just send a poem of anything (League related) and get RP?


.... Fuck it im writing a story.
Write about the little vel'koz that could (Hit that ult)
Was thinking more of Shurima based.
as long as there is a teemo execution we are all happy
As long as it has Azir in it you're good to go
ok, i send a support request is that what you meant for me to do?
Thats right, wait for them to get back to you and it should be sorted
a poem to Riot for 3 rp is kinda cute aha
I tried to refund Bloodmoon Thresh after I bought him 1 day before Mata Thresh was announced. They denied me :( Best of luck to you man but I'm not so sure it'll work out
